title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: This chart shows how many Minutes certain Age Group spend on Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily every day in Maputo .
15 - 24 year olds spend the most Time at 180 Minutes , followed by 25 - 34 at 160 Minutes , then 35 - 44 at 120 Minutes , then 45 - 54 at almost 100 Minutes and lastly 55 - 64 at around 70 Minutes .
gold: This graph shows the average time in minutes spent by different age groups on social media daily . On average 15 - 24 years olds were spending 180 minutes a day , 25 - 34 year olds were spending 160 minutes per day . This decreased again for 35 - 44 year old to 120 minutes per day .
